content.title: Invoking Services
content.body:
1. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Navigation Object and select lblPayeeID_text {string}.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > Service - RecipientStorage$Recipients$get and select RecipientID {number}.
    Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types, click OK.
  3. From the Action Editor canvas, select Callback.
  4. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Mapping, select Add Mapping.
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
